Posts.Content: Oct 31, 2010 11:13PM 0000000 wrote: just wondering if it's routine to be prescribed an antibiotic after lumpectomy..  had my lumpectomy 3 days ago and on the discharge paper it just said vicodin and colace and no antibiotic.. a course I was kinda out of it at the time so didn't notice until the next morning (saturday, and the pharmacy was closed)that no antibiotic was prescribed.. .. should I just wait and ask my surgeon at my follow up exam (which is in a week)?  i hate to worry unnecessarily and don't wan't to take any more medication than is necessary.. i am sure  I have no infection and very little pain/swelling after the procedure. but I can't help wonder if this was an oversight or whether it's just not something that's automatically prescribed post surgery.  thanks!
